Thanks

I listed the stinkin things on ebay before I got this notification here.  I had to go and search for my thread.     if you type in any of the names on ebay, and see one that interest you, just holla for a better deal.    I collect Point Pleasant Series 4 and just need one more to complete my team set.

Weber and Kirkpatrick are now gone.  Still have others.    Someone asked about Kuene and schafer from point pleasant.  They are both rough.  Would just receive a authentic grade.  Those are worth more to me to keep opposed to selling cheap.  Would gladly trade them for a Dougherty.
